outputEsc

@Deprecated
public static void outputEsc(Writer out,
                                        String s,
                                        boolean useSlashEscapes)
Deprecated. 

Output a string, using \t etc and \ u escape mechanisms.

Parameters:
out - Writer for output
s - String to process
useSlashEscapes - Whether to use \t etc (\\ is awlays possible).
